Work Experience

All-rounder with District, State and National Ranker and National Medalist or Winner. Keen observer, explorer and enthusiast for learning Software Technology as quickly possibly as it is. Defined strict rules, which cannot be ruled out even by myself. Hoped to self learn and mutually respect Software Industry. Gut says that intuition will kill any negativity inside us and heal ourselves as fast as possible.

DRDL, DRDO (Ministry of Defence)

Project consists of Software Database been learnt with keen observation. And, Boss has appreciated and recommended service to every person. Finally, Gave knowledge transfer to colleague, trained a junior apprentice, Interviewed Apprenticeship persons. Received Appreciation from Superior Persons of DRDL.

DRDL, DRDO (Ministry of Defence)

Project consists of Software Database been learnt with keen observation. And, Boss has appreciated and recommended service to every person. Finally, Gave knowledge transfer to colleague, trained a junior apprentice, Interviewed Apprenticeship persons. Received Appreciation from Superior Persons of DRDL.

Strategic Solutions Group (Boston, USA)

MAVEN Project member, with JIRA tickets of around 15 completed and AWS workspace/Production support tasks for about 2 times per day for 1 week. And, Peer review for about 4 hours has been done with colleague. Also, Resolved Cloud watch complex Database queries with Right Think at the Right Moment. Finally, Appreciation by CTO, CXO and CFO in Tenure.

); } export default Work;
